name: Ronald CHAVIS, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent

judges: Justice MUNDY did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: Ronald CHAVIS, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of July, 2016, the Application for Extraordinary Relief Pursuant to King’s Bench Powers is DENIED.
Justice MUNDY did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
143 A.3d 383
Ronald CHAVIS, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent.
No. 94 EM 2016.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 27, 2016.
